attributes.action: reintroduce trolley buses to the towns and cities of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we introduced trolleybuses to our towns to replace the heavy fuel Consuming motor buses to help clear the air in the cities and towns. And by doing this, it will also help the environment and help prevent Global-Warming.Trollrybuses are green and environmentally friendly, plus they can be powered by wind turbines and solar panels
